about_the_game:
Help run Pinecreek Hills and the Park Ranger Reunion Celebration

Help the famous Park Rangers run Pinecreek Hills & the 25th Anniversary Ranger Reunion. Have fun organizing events on Bluewaters lake, Cherokee river and Apache trail. Ride Pinecreek’s awesome Aerial Tramway & Railroad.

Learn about Wildlife. Camp & Picnic beside Rivers and Bayous. Explore atmospheric Waterfalls, Caves, enchanted Gorges and Gorgeous outdoor locations.

Discover Prehistoric animal bones, have Campfires, spot Bears, Deer and Eagles. Go on a Night Prowl & Skywatch. Supervise the famous ‘7 Peaks’ race.

Play great Hogs & Puzzles, Spot 100’s of Animals, Birds, Fish and Wildlife. Protect the environment, get Souvenirs and Awards along the way.

Find objects in beautiful Hidden Object Scenes along with a wide range of puzzle games.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 12

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 600Mhz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 7.0a
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
